application_of_law: interpret and apply laws under the Act
decision_reasoning: administrative tribunals with jurisdiction to decide questions of law are presumed to have concomitant jurisdiction to decide constitutional validity unless excluded by legislature
cause_of_action: lack of structural guarantees for an independent tribunal
procedure_followed: judicial review application by Attorney General of Canada against a delegate's decision affirming tribunal's jurisdiction
result_of_case: application dismissed; tribunal confirmed to have jurisdiction over constitutional questions
